metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16154 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The App::cpanminus package 1.7044 for Perl allows Signature VerificationBypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cpanminus - 1.7045-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cpanminus package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7045-1').
